---------- Input ----------
drop table if a.b;
---------- Output ---------
error: 
  --> SQL:1:12
  |
1 | drop table if a.b;
  | ----       ^^ expected token <Ident>
  | |           
  | while parsing DROP TABLE statement


---------- Input ----------
truncate table a
---------- Output ---------
error: 
  --> SQL:1:17
  |
1 | truncate table a
  | --------        ^ expected token ";"
  | |               
  | while parsing TRUNCATE TABLE statement
